attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The whole idea of claiming on the one hand to be a democracy and suporting 
free speech and then on the other to go
and charge people over a hundred pounds
for 'free speech' is politically dishonest.  If the service of the BBC is
good then let people 'subscribe' to it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
